Class WakeUpEvent

java.lang.Object
  Event
      WakeUpEvent

public class WakeUpEvent
extends Event

A WakeUp event occurs when an I/O operation completes.

Version:
8/3/15
Author:
Stephan Jamieson

Constructor Summary
WakeUpEvent(long systemTime, IODevice device, ProcessControlBlock process)
          Create a WakeUpEvent for the given process waiting on an I/O operation on the given device.
